official_title: Joint resolution designating the second Sunday in June of each year as Children's Day.

summary.text: Designates the second Sunday in June of each year as "Children's Day" to renew our commitments to guarantee our children a better life.

titles.title: Joint resolution designating the second Sunday in June of each year as Children's Day.
